changeSet.author: jamiewhths
changeSet.comment: Add allowCreate, allowCreateAll, allowDelete, allowDeleteAll columns to UserPermission table with default 0
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE userpermission ADD COLUMN createRecord bit(1) NOT null DEFAULT 0, ADD COLUMN editRecord bit(1) NOT null DEFAULT 0, ADD COLUMN deleteRecord bit(1) NOT null DEFAULT 0;

changeSet.author: jamiewhths
changeSet.comment: Set allowCreate, allowCreateAll, allowDelete, allowDeleteAll equal to allowEdit/allowEditAll columns
changeSet.sql: UPDATE userpermission SET allowCreate = AllowEdit, allowCreateAll = AllowEditAll, allowDelete = AllowEdit, allowDeleteAll = AllowEditAll;
